pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, October 4, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Tuesday, October 4, 2016:

Ottawa, Ontario

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Cabinet Meeting.

Note for media:

  • Ministers will be available to media in the House of Commons Foyer as of 12:00 p.m.

12:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Vigil for the families of Sisters in Spirit.

Front Lawn
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Note for media:

  • Open coverage

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

PMO Media Relations:
Media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
